name: Burger
instructions: 1.start with 2 halves of a bun </br> 2.cook a hamburger to you liking </br> 3.place the burger patty on the buns </br> 4.add any condiments you might like and you Burger is ready to devour!

name: Peanut Butter & Jelly Sandwich
instructions: 1.start with 2 peices of bread </br> 2.apply peanut butter to one piece </br> 3.apply jelly to the other piece </br> 4.put the two pieces together and enjoy your delicious PBJ!

name: Cereal
instructions: 1.start by filling a bowl with cereal </br> 2.then fill the bowl with milk to your liking and its time to eat!
